name: Copper Vein
description: A vein of greenish-brown copper ore running through the rock.
gatherMessage: You swing your pickaxe at the copper vein.

name: Coal Deposit
description: Dark seams of coal embedded in the cave wall.
gatherMessage: You chip away at the coal deposit.

name: Iron Vein
description: A thick vein of reddish iron ore streaked through the stone.
gatherMessage: You strike the iron vein with your pickaxe.

name: Crystal Formation
description: A cluster of luminous crystals jutting from the cave wall, pulsing with faint energy.
gatherMessage: You carefully chip crystals from the formation.

name: Herb Patch
description: A patch of fragrant green herbs growing in the damp soil.
gatherMessage: You carefully pick the healing herbs.

name: Rare Mushroom Cluster
description: A cluster of bioluminescent mushrooms radiating a soft blue glow.
gatherMessage: You carefully harvest the glowing mushrooms.

name: Ancient Rubble
description: A pile of crumbling stone and debris from collapsed ruins. Something might be buried within.
gatherMessage: You dig through the ancient rubble.

name: Forgotten Cache
description: A small alcove sealed behind loose stones. Something glints within the darkness.
gatherMessage: You pry open the forgotten cache.
